DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this study is to determine whether having a telephone discussion with a nurse educator about making treatment decisions and participating in a clinical trial increases trial participation. The investigators hypothesize that the participants in the intervention group will be more likely to take part in a clinical trial than those in the usual care group.
DOC.brief_title: CHOICES: Understanding Clinical Trials as a Treatment Option
DOC.criteria: Patients who are potentially eligible for one of the designated clinical trials on the basis of automated data from pathology reports and other databases Patients who meet specific exclusion criteria for designated clinical trials
